title: The history of Hai Eb'n Yockdan, an Indian prince, or, The self-taught philosopher written originally in the Arabick tongue by Abi Jaafar Eb'n Tophail ... ; set forth not long ago in the original Arabick, with the Latin version by Edw. Pocock ... ; and now translated into English.
author: Ibn Ṭufayl, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Malik, d. 1185.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Richard Chiswell ... and William Thorp ...,
